Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: A3 and A4 photocopier, fax service (sending and receiving), jigsaws, language tapes, talking books, large print books, videos, DVDs and children's play equipment. Exhibition space, noticeboard and bookable community room are available. Activities include computer courses and various recreational and children's activities. Provides 4 People's Network computers (1 dedicated to children and 1 large screen for visually impaired people) with Microsoft Office and Internet access available for public use.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 10am-12.30pm, 1.30-5.30pm, Tues & Wed closed, Thurs 9.30am-12.30pm, 1.30-5.30pm, Fri 9.30am-12.30pm, 1.30-7pm, Sat 9.30am-12.30pm (opening times); Mon 10am-12noon (Community Crafts, see separate entry), Mon 2-3pm (under 5s stories and activities), Tues 9.30-11.30am (beginners IT), Wed 1-3pm (yoga), Wed 3.30-5.30pm (beginners IT), Thurs 9.30-11.30am (digital photography), Thurs 2-3pm (chair aerobics), Fri 1.30-3pm (Health Walks), 1st Thurs in the month & 1st & 3rd Sat in the month 10.30am-12noon (Councillor's Surgeries), 1st Fri in the month 10-11am (Baby Time), 3rd Fri in the month (reading group, see separate entry)
